This is NOT a MULTI version. 'cause if you go to the DishonoredGameLocalization folder, all folders are empty... You need to download this :
(search "skidrow dishonored language pack" on google)

Unzip it in the DishonoredGame folder, then edit the file BinariesWin32steam_3d.ini and change the line "Language=english" to "Language=french" or whatever you want. It really works, I play the game in french right now ! :)

But thx anyway to abernick, the game works fine with the crack (but in english).
